remMethod.val: ob(向) + long(长的) → 向一边变长 → 矩形； 椭圆形

trans.tranCn: 矩形的，长方形的；椭圆形的
trans.tranOther: an oblong shape has four straight sides at 90 degrees to each other, two of which are longer than the other two

trans.tranCn: 矩形， 长方形； 椭圆形
trans.tranOther: An oblong is a shape which has two long sides and two short sides and in which all the angles are right angles
